text: dhlk al'imdad lahum hataa ytmadu fi alkfr; bsbb 'anahum qaluu llyhwd aladhin karihuu ma nazal allh: sanutieukum fi baed al'amr aldhy hu khilaf li'amr allah wamur rswlh, wallah taealaa yaelam ma ykhfyh hwla' wysrwnh, falyahdhar almuslim min taeat ghayr allah fima yukhalif 'amr allah sbhanh, wamur rasulih muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm
